advantage.eyebrow: The Design for Good Initiative Advantage
advantage.title: We've Helped Businesses Grow. Now We're Helping Causes Thrive.
advantage.description: This is more than design support — it's a purpose-built initiative created by the team at **DesignWorks Bureau** to bring professional-grade creative to the nonprofit sector. You get a complete design team without the cost of hiring one.

benefits.title: 40% First-Year Savings
benefits.description: Founding members save thousands — so more of your budget goes where it matters.

benefits.title: 72-Hour Delivery
benefits.description: Quick, reliable turnaround. Launch faster, look sharper, stay ahead.

benefits.title: Unlimited Requests
benefits.description: Ask for anything — no caps, no surprise fees, just continuous support.

benefits.title: Mission-Matched Design
benefits.description: Every visual is tailored to your cause, audience, and voice.

advantage.conclusion: It's everything you'd expect from a top-tier agency — rebuilt for impact-first organizations.
